title: New:  Guerre – For Qwanisha
body: Sydney based artist **[Guerre](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9032-review-guerre-darker-my-love/ "Review: Guerre – Darker My Love")** returns with this subdued yet spiraling b-side, _For Qwanisha_, taken from his digital 7”, out now to buy over at his [bandcamp.](http://music.yespleaserecords.com/album/rashad-loose-pace-for-qwanisha) The a-side, [_Rashad (Loose Pace_)](http://music.yespleaserecords.com/track/rashad-loose-pace-2) was a track that unfortunately passed us by when it dropped last month, so use this as an opportunity to go back; it’s just as lucid and gentle as this b-side.

excerpt.full: Sydney based artist Guerre returns with this subdued yet spiraling b-side, For Qwanisha, taken from his digital 7”, out now to buy over at his bandcamp.
